page.title: 17PRICES IN NORTH BLYTH
page.content:
We have found out the prices of seven commonly bought items at two different shop in our area.Both shops were small local general dealers.
{ ITEM SHOP A SHOP B } ****** ******** ********
CORNFLAKES Â£0.68 Â£0.89 MAXWELL HOUSE Â£1.48 Â£1.20 OXO CUBES Â£0.23 Â£0.19 WHITE BREAD Â£0.36 Â£0.36 TIN OF PEAS Â£0.15 Â£0.12 TIN OF CARROTS Â£0.21 Â£0.22 TEA BAGS Â£0.64 Â£0.69 _______ _______ { TOTAL Â£3.75 Â£3.67}
As you can see the difference is only eight pence.If the cheapest items from each list are bought the price is only {Â£3.40,}so it pays to shop around.
